title: Someone invite me to a gold team?
body:
Hey, id like to be invited to a gold team just temporarily please!
I would REALLY appreciate it!!
Just for the end of seasons rewards end, then ill leave if you want

Please, I just really want these rewards
I've been playing this game for two years, and I'm in Silver 5
I literally only play ranked
I play seriously, but I don't climb, but I see other people play for 1 1/2 years and are diamond...
It confuses me.

Please add me on league if you're willing to help me out! It would be greatly appreciated !
PLEASE :')

replies.body: Grind your way to gold dude, earn it.
You need to play 10 games with that ranked team in order to receive the rewards.
